Description.Name: Mercenary Review Board: Kurita
Description.Details:
Darius brings to the briefing an issue that has lingered on the back-burner ever since that ill-fated Contract to eliminate a defector from the Draconis Combine.

"The Mercenary Review Board has finally reviewed our claim of Non-Payment, and have invited us to a sit down with the House Kurita envoy, [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRepKurita],Shugo Yamaguchi]]." 

Sumire bristles in her chair. "Finally! I say we take our pound of flesh, and an extra pound for our troubles!"

Darius shakes his head. "I can't believe I'm suggesting walking away from C-Bills, but If we allow Yamaguchi to save face here, we could gain a significant boost in our reputation with Kurita."

Dr. Murad clears her throat and pauses, holding the room's attention. "Remember how the Shugo delegated the contract to his [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreGakuHironaka],underling]], so he could rush off to Herotitus? The notorious pleasure planet?" She pauses again before adding,  "Do you think we could get some leverage from that?"

Description.Name: Let the evidence speak for itself.
success, rep gain, money gain
Description.Details:
When you arrive with Darius at the local MRB offices, [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRepKurita], Shugo Yamaguchi]] is already there. He nods stiffly in your direction.

The Review Board agent walks everyone through the contract, including video footage and witness testimonies. Darius bites his tongue when the agent reads a statement from [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreGakuHironaka],Chu-i Hironaka]] refuting claims regarding the quality of the intelligence provided. Yamaguchi follows your lead and keeps quiet throughout.

Back in the reception area again while the MRB deliberates, the Shugo leans close enough that only the two of you can hear. "You were in the right here. Hironaka has been disciplined appropriately. Win or lose, you have acted the professional."

When the MRB agent appears and rules in your favor on all counts, Yamaguchi bows deeply and departs without another word.

Description.Name: Take a hard line stance on payment plus extra for 'damages.'
success, rep loss, big money gain
Description.Details:
When you arrive with Darius at the local MRB offices, [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRepKurita], Shugo Yamaguchi]] is already there. He nods stiffly in your direction.

The Review Board agent walks everyone through the contract, including video footage and witness testimonies. When Darius hears the statement from [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreGakuHironaka],Chu-i Hironaka]] refuting claims regarding the quality of the intelligence provided, the discussion gets heated. Yamaguchi comes to the defense of his 'Mech Commander, and soon the MRB agent is forced to clear the room.

Finally, the MRB agent appears and delivers the ruling in your favor on all counts, with additional compensation for 'damages' to the Company's reputation. Yamaguchi turns on his heels and departs without another word.

Description.Name: Concede the case to curry favor with Kurita.
success, big rep gain, some money
Description.Details:
When you arrive with Darius at the local MRB offices, [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRepKurita], Shugo Yamaguchi]] is already there. He nods stiffly in your direction.

The Review Board agent begins to walk everyone through the contract, including video footage and witness testimonies. Before any debate can begin, however, you interrupt. "Upon further review of the evidence, we wish to withdraw our complaint. Our apologies to the honorable representative of the Draconis Combine for any inconvenience we have caused." 

In the shocked silence that follows, you can hear the sound of Darius's teeth grinding together.

Back in the reception area, while the MRB finalizes the paperwork, the Shugo leans close enough that only the two of you can hear. "You are full of surprises, Commander. Keep an eye on your bank account for a small thank-you." Yamaguchi bows deeply and departs without another word.

Description.Name: Blackmail Yamaguchi to force a settlement before arbitration.
success, rep loss, big money gain
Description.Details:
Turning to Darius, who is already deep in thought, you say, "What do you think? Perhaps your contacts in the Black Market could dig up the dirt we would need?"

The XO scowls but agrees. "He’ll certainly back off before he brings shame to his family or to the House. I'll get on it right away."

Later in the week, you receive a recorded message from [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreRepKurita], Shugo Yamaguchi]] "Commander, I am contacting you regarding our little dispute, and how you have seen fit to involve the MRB. I have decided to concede all points in your favor."

With a thin-lipped look that seems a cross between anger and respect, he continues. "I did not expect such cunning from a mere Mercenary. We will, of course, never speak of this again."
